BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.config.ProxyConfigurationLoader.rebuildGlobalRuleConfiguration(YamlProxyServerConfiguration) excessively uses methods of another class
This API (java/io/File.<init>(Ljava/lang/String;)V) reads a file whose location might be specified by user input
Static or private method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.config.yaml.swapper.YamlProxyConfigurationSwapper.swapDataSourceConfigurations(Map, String) has unused parameters
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.connector.BackendConnection has a circular dependency with other classes
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.connector.BackendConnection has a circular dependency with other classes
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.connector.BackendConnection.resetSessionVariablesIfNecessary(Collection, Collection) executes SQL queries inside of loops
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.connector.BackendConnection.setSessionVariablesIfNecessary(List) executes SQL queries inside of loops
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.connector.BackendConnection.setSessionVariablesIfNecessary(List) uses iterator().next() on a List to get the first item
This use of java/sql/Statement.execute(Ljava/lang/String;)Z can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
This use of java/sql/Statement.execute(Ljava/lang/String;)Z can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)

Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.connector.ProxySQLExecutor has a circular dependency with other classes
